content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 29}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a crafting_table, I need to move 4 oak_planks to the crafting grid. There are 3 oak_planks in slot 42, so I will first move 1 of them to slot 1 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "oak_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 29}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}]
thought: I have moved 1 oak_planks to slot 1 of the crafting grid, so I will now move another 1 oak_planks to slot 2 of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: crafting_table
inventory=[{"type": "crafting_table", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "sea_lantern", "quantity": 39, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 52, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 11, "index": 29}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 31, "index": 36}]
thought: I have moved 4 oak_planks and 1 warped_planks to the crafting grid, so I will now craft the crafting_table and move it to slot 11 of the inventory.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
